results.content: OK, but the trainer tends to fast forward past certain important concepts leaving the student confused. I also felt that if each chapter begins with a quick intro of the chapter and outlines the task to be completed during the chapter and outlines the high-level steps to achieve the task, that will be super helpful to learners.

response.content: Thanks for enrolling Amit.  I notice that your review is on the low side (3).  Our reviews are very important to us.  We are here to help you.  What could we do to help improve this review?
